about.heading: Our Developers
about.text: VersaLog is created by developers who love open source.

doc.title: Documentation
doc.description: VersaLog provides fast, extensible logging for multiple languages. Choose a language below to see examples and API usage.

python.title: VersaLog for Python
python.description: VersaLog for Python offers lightweight, async-ready logging with flexible formatting options.

javascript.title: VersaLog for JavaScript
javascript.description: VersaLog for JavaScript provides modern logging for Node.js and browsers, with structured output and extensibility.

rust.title: VersaLog for Rust
rust.description: VersaLog for Rust provides safe, high-performance logging with async support and system log integration.

go.title: VersaLog for Go
go.description: VersaLog for Go offers simple, high-performance logging that works safely in concurrent environments.

ruby.title: VersaLog for Ruby
ruby.description: VersaLog for Ruby delivers clean, human-readable log output with a focus on simplicity.
